meanings.definition: The quality or state of being representative.
meanings.sent1: Her speech had a strong sense of representativeness, capturing the views of many people.
meanings.sent2: The student council election results showed the representativeness of the student body's opinions.
meanings.sent3: The representativeness of the cake to the birthday girl's favorite color made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The artist's painting achieved a level of representativeness that resonated with the audience.
meanings.sent5: The representativeness of the data was crucial for making informed decisions.

meanings.definition: The extent to which a sample accurately reflects the characteristics of the population from which it is drawn.
meanings.sent1: The representativeness of the survey results was questioned due to the small sample size.
meanings.sent2: Researchers strive for high representativeness when conducting studies to ensure reliable outcomes.
meanings.sent3: The representativeness of the weather forecast was surprisingly accurate for once.
meanings.sent4: The representativeness of the mirror's reflection distorted the true image of the room.
meanings.sent5: The representativeness of the model's walk showcased the designer's vision perfectly.
